term.title: phosphoramides

item.text: Compounds in which one or more of the OH groups of phosphoric acid have been replaced with an amino or substituted amino group; commonly confined to the phosphoric triamides, P(=O)(NR2)3, since replacement of one or two OH groups produces phosphoramidic acids P(=O)(OH)(NR2)2, P(=O)(OH)2(NR2).
